channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Beeston to transform Judith's empty new-build garden into a Swedish-inspired space with a country cottage twist.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Garden
channel.desc: Alan Titchmarsh and his team deliver breath-taking gardens to some of Britain's most deserving families. In this episode he travels to Walsall to surprise a young widow.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country House Auction
channel.desc: A 19th-century Japanese silver punchbowl, a boule table and a John Constable painting go under the hammer. And will a 1930s Philco radio make a sound profit.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Greatest Auction
channel.desc: How much will the collectors and dealers bid for a Banksy artwork, pickled pig foetuses and Tommy Cooper's fez.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Flipping Profit
channel.desc: An antiques expert, a market trader and an upcycler compete to make the most money. Catherine Southon, Tony Wong and Micaela Sharp head to Faversham.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Royal Road Trip with Darcey Bussell
channel.desc: Darcey's adventure concludes in Wales where she visits St David's Cathedral and a royal gold mine in Snowdonia. Last in series.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country House Auction
channel.desc: An Egyptian amulet, a silver pin cushion and a collection of timepieces make the auction tick. And will someone be sitting pretty on some Louis XVI gilt chairs.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Greatest Auction
channel.desc: How much will the collectors and dealers bid for a Banksy artwork, pickled pig foetuses and Tommy Cooper's fez.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Beeston to transform Judith's empty new-build garden into a Swedish-inspired space with a country cottage twist.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Garden
channel.desc: Alan Titchmarsh and the make-over-team a flood-wrecked Somerset garden into a picture perfect paradise fit for Hollywood.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Highclere
channel.desc: The team mark the centenary of the 5th Earl of Carnarvon's discovery of Tutankhamen's tomb, and prepare for the biggest event of the summer - the Battle Proms.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: This, That and the Other
channel.desc: Saucy and trippy British comedy about three men caught up in compromising situations during their normal daily lives. Starring Dennis Waterman and Vanda Hudson. Contains nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Real Thick Glasses
channel.desc: Solomon Watkins' quirky take as he interviews Michael, owner of the world's most unique collection of Really Thick Glasses. Funded and supported by Together TV and Cat Flap Media.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Die Screaming Marianne
channel.desc: Marianne, a nightclub dancer, is on the run from vicious criminals. Trickery and betrayal are around every corner in this suspense-filled thriller. Susan George stars.

channel.title: Country House Auction
channel.desc: An Egyptian amulet, a silver pin cushion and a collection of timepieces make the auction tick. And will someone be sitting pretty on some Louis XVI gilt chairs.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Lee and Flo are in Fleet to design a relaxing family space for single dad Stuart and his daughter Freya, with separate spaces where they can hang out without disturbing each other.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Garden
channel.desc: Alan Titchmarsh and the make-over-team a flood-wrecked Somerset garden into a picture perfect paradise fit for Hollywood.

channel.desc: An Egyptian amulet, a silver pin cushion and a collection of timepieces make the auction tick. And will someone be sitting pretty on some Louis XVI gilt chairs.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Greatest Auction
channel.desc: A 1940s fairground attraction, Saddam Hussein's fork and a pinball machine signed by Elton John come to the auction house.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Flipping Profit
channel.desc: An antiques expert, a market trader and an upcycler compete to make the most money. Roo Irvine, Danny Sebastian and Kevin Paxton head to the Scottish Borders.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: D Day - Hour by Hour
channel.desc: On the 80th anniversary of D-Day, a turning point of World War II, extraordinary archive materials reveal contrasting stories from the Allied Normandy beach landings of 6 June 1944.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country House Auction
channel.desc: A Victorian mirror and some acclaimed works of art go under the hammer. And will an extremely collectable consignment of wine get the auction's juices flowing? Last in series.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Greatest Auction
channel.desc: A 1940s fairground attraction, Saddam Hussein's fork and a pinball machine signed by Elton John come to the auction house.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Garden
channel.desc: Alan and the team create a spectacular Space Age garden for a war hero and his young family in rural Cornwall.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Highclere
channel.desc: The castle transforms into a magical winter wonderland, as the team wrestle their biggest-ever tree and butler Louis gets very merry hosting a cocktail making master class. Last in series.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Au Pair Girls
channel.desc: Seventies film following the misadventures of four female au pairs who arrive at Heathrow Airport and are whisked off to work for different families. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Mary Millington
channel.desc: from the David Galaxy Affair. A playboy astrologer has to prove his alibi for a years-old robbery. With Mary Millington, Rosemary England and Diana Dors. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country House Auction
channel.desc: A Victorian mirror and some acclaimed works of art go under the hammer. And will an extremely collectable consignment of wine get the auction's juices flowing? Last in series.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Royal Road Trip with Darcey Bussell
channel.desc: Darcey begins her royal road trip at the Highland Games in Balmoral, before sampling royal whisky and attempting a dance at the Ghillies Ball.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Eastergate to design a contemporary garden for Rob and Helen with space for them to entertain.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Garden
channel.desc: Alan and the team create a spectacular Space Age garden for a war hero and his young family in rural Cornwall.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country House Auction
channel.desc: A Victorian mirror and some acclaimed works of art go under the hammer. And will an extremely collectable consignment of wine get the auction's juices flowing? Last in series.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Home and Garden
channel.desc: Alan Titchmarsh and his team head to Banbury to surprise young carers who help look after their mother, and transform their indoor and outdoor spaces.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Home and Garden
channel.desc: Alan Titchmarsh and his team of experts transform both the house and the garden in Eltham for the family of a young boy with dystonic quadriplegic cerebral palsy.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Water Babies
channel.desc: A young chimney sweep falsely accused of theft escapes into a river, entering a magical animated underwater world where he helps free captive Water Babies. A British classic.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Detonator - Death Train
channel.desc: Action. Terrorists place an atomic bomb on a hijacked train. The UN assembles a crack task force to take them out. Stars Pierce Brosnan, Patrick Stewart and Christopher Lee.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Commandos
channel.desc: Action. World War II. Allied commandos are parachuted into North Africa on a mission to infiltrate and hold an Axis-held fort until reinforcements arrive. Lee Van Cleef stars.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: I'm Not Feeling Myself Tonight
channel.desc: Hapless Jon Pigeon works in a sex research institute. To seduce a colleague, he invents an aphrodisiac-emitter machine turning any man or woman into a horny fiend. Contains nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Groupie Girl
channel.desc: Sally runs away from her strict upbringing to become a rock band's groupie. A cautionary tale of hairy hippies and heartbreak. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Detonator - Death Train
channel.desc: Action. Terrorists place an atomic bomb on a hijacked train. The UN assembles a crack task force to take them out. Stars Pierce Brosnan, Patrick Stewart and Christopher Lee.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: In The Spotlight
channel.desc: Exploring the working lives of musicians working in London's West End from 1950s Soho, jazz clubs and theatre up to the present day.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Bristol to create a Mediterranean-inspired space that will rekindle happy holiday memories for young couple Emily and Maurice.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Black Beauty
channel.desc: Faithful version of classic children's tale featuring the adventures of spirited horse Black Beauty. Can her young owner get her back? Mark Lester - of Oliver! fame - stars.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Battle of Britain - Empty Skies
channel.desc: Interviews with 19 men and women who were part of the Battle of Britain - unique accounts of the parts they played in the nation's defence, in their own words.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Assassination Bureau
channel.desc: Action. Would-be journalist Sonya Winter investigates the Assassination Bureau, a mysterious organization. Ollie Reed and Diana Rigg star.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Buster
channel.desc: Comedy. The story of Great Train Robber Buster Edwards, a small-timer who fell in with more ambitious thieves. Phil Collins and Julie Walters star.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Magnificent Seven Deadly Sins
channel.desc: Bawdy seventies sketch comedy film starring a bevy of British talent from Bruce Forsyth and Harry Secombe to Joan Simms and June Whitfield. Contains 70s social attitudes.[(96057)]
